name: Zombie Defense Pro
description: The Zombies have come back in time to take control of Vini's Castle! Play as Vinny and help him make his last stand against the hordes of war hardened Zombies!! Fight off bosses such as Herr.Gruber, the deranged zombie lord who is hellbent on stealing Vinny's hard-earned treasures using a range of weapons including machettes, machine guns and even a lightning cannon! Use your Berserk, freeze, soul attack and bomb power-ups to help you in your struggle to hold off enemies until all have been driven back and the sands turn blood red in this ultimate Zombie Defence game! Call on the help of your Viking cousins and mow down the undead hordes as only a Viking can! Are you worthy of Valhalla? Download the ultimate castle defence game now and see how far you can go!! OMG Zombies are attacking your castle, Stupid Zombies will Die, they are crushing Plants and trees to get to your castle these stupid zombies need to die. Are they coming from a zombie village, The walking Dead are coming to get you. Check out the leaderboards to check who is the BEST zombie killer! If you love shooting zombies, you will love this game!
